message:
#164 - Annotate API methods in the Configurator extension point (#165)

* #164 - Annotate API methods in the Configurator extension point

* #164 - Introduce new top-level ElementConfigurator interface

* #164 - Introduce new ConfiguratorException to propagate configurator issues

* #164 - Rework Configurator#configure() and ConfigurationAsCode method to throw the new exception type

* #164 - ElementConfigurator is now a generic interface

* Implement types in RootElementConfigurator, fix FindBugs issues due to possible NPEs

added: public ProjectMatrixAuthorizationStrategy configure(Object config) throws ConfiguratorException {
deleted: public ProjectMatrixAuthorizationStrategy configure(Object config) throws Exception {
